events.name: A supermarket??
events.description: While walking through the jungle you notice a... supermarket? There don't seem to be any buildings nearby, just this one chain-market building. What.

possibleOutcomes.outcomeText: You go inside. It's just a regular supermarket. There are some free cheese samples. You eat a few of those. You browse around a bit and leave before security starts looking at you weird.
Supermarkets are scary enough on their own. It seems way out of place and it would be a bad idea to go in. You leave.

events.name: Coupons
events.description: You find a coupon for the supermarket you saw before. Free sneakers for the first five customers!

possibleOutcomes.outcomeText: It's always nice to have a coupon.

events.name: Supermarket... again?
events.description: You notice a familiar sign. It's the jungle supermarket. And you have a coupon for those sneakers!

choices.actionText: Go inside and hope the coupon is still valid.

possibleOutcomes.outcomeText: You strut in and graciously give the cashier your coupon. They didn't really know what to do with it. After a 15 minute talk with the store manager you finally wear them down and receive a pair of fancy new supersneakers!
